main event: A UFO was sighted in West Babylon, New York, between July 16 and July 20, 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed visually and with radar for about 15 minutes., The object appeared to be rotating pendulum-like around a center when viewed through binoculars., Witnesses described a clear night without storms during the sightings., The object would disappear from view when directly overhead., The conclusion was that the sightings might have been caused by lightning rather than a UFO.
witness description: Mr. Albion and his nephews, including witnesses from the Civil Air Patrol
